mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction_fail (id, transaction_id, operation_id,fail_cause, create_time) VALUES ( #{id}, #{transactionId}, #{operationId}, #{failCause}, #{createTime})

INSERT INTO transaction_fail (id, transaction_id, operation_id,fail_cause, create_time) VALUES
(#{obj.id}, #{obj.transactionId}, #{obj.operationId}, #{obj.failCause}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT f.id AS fail_id, f.transaction_id, f.operation_id, f.fail_cause, f.create_time AS fail_time l.name AS transaction_name, o.name AS operation_name, o.topic FROM transaction_fail f LEFT JOIN transaction_log l ON l.id = f.transaction_id LEFT JOIN transaction_operation o ON o.id = f.operation_id
